page.pageName: PAYGO - All Plans - DNS - LP - Page

metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Plans | Easy-to-use performance and security tools your website needs
metaTags.metaDescription: All Cloudflare plans come with ultra-fast DNS, a global CDN, and comprehensive DDoS protection. But you may need to enable add-ons or choose a higher plan to get more features, control, and customization. So which plan to go for? Here's all the info you need to make the right decision, based on your needs.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Free DNS included with any Cloudflare plan
relatedBlades.copy: Behind every successful website is a reliable DNS. Cloudflare DNS is one of the world's fastest with a worldwide DNS propagation in less than 5 seconds. Cloudflare is used as a DNS server provider for more websites than any other provider*.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the internet-connected world is within %{OperationMilliseconds}ms of a Cloudflare server.

relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare powers millions of Internet properties

Here are some you might recognize

All Cloudflare self-serve plans at a glance

You can find in-depth information further down the page

features.title: Free plan
features.description: Best suited for personal projects. You get access to world-class DNS, CDN, and SSL protection and can enable further add-ons at the click of a button.

features.title: Pro plan
features.description: Choose this plan for your professional websites and applications. You get the same great DNS, CDN, and SSL but also Lossless Image Optimization and Accelerated Mobile Pages for faster loading speed.

features.title: Business plan
features.description: Designed for business-critical websites and applications. It gives you the highest level of control and customization of all self-serve plans, plus 100% uptime SLA and prioritized ticket support.

relatedBlades.quote: "Our DNS times (as measured by our monitoring service) have declined from 700ms – 1 second down to 4ms – 100ms. This improvement rolls through to our web page load times, positively impacting our website visitors' experiences on our sites."

relatedBlades.copy:
Why should you sign up for a Cloudflare plan?

These out-of-the-box solutions can help you save time and money

features.title: Free, Fast, and Secure DNS Included
features.description: Cloudflare authoritative DNS gives you the fastest response time, unparalleled redundancy, and advanced security with built-in DDoS mitigation and DNSSEC.

features.title: Ultra-fast network
features.description: Each of these plans gives you instant access to Cloudflare's vast global network placing your website or application within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms from %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the world's internet-connected population.

features.title: Unlimited DDoS protection
features.description: Enjoy peace of mind thanks to always-on and always-learning DDoS mitigation and attack alerts. For increased protection you can upgrade your plan to enable extra security features.

features.title: No-code performance tools
features.description: You don't really know how to code? No problem. The setup is simple, fast, and intuitive and you can turn on extra features at the simple click of a button.

features.title: Best-in-class WAF
features.description: Each plan comes with our free Managed Ruleset to protect your site from high severity vulnerabilities. Plus, you can build your own custom firewall rules to further secure your web properties.

features.title: All your tools into one
features.description: Cloudflare plans are designed to provide you with all the tools you need to launch, secure and accelerate your internet properties — so you can stop managing multiple vendors and plugins.

relatedBlades.copy:
Upgrade your website security with the Pro plan

Enable one-click bot mitigation and advanced Web Application Firewall (WAF)

- Cloudflare Pro is best suited for professional websites, high traffic blogs, and startups requiring increased security and performance. - The Pro plan gives you access to 20 WAF custom rules, managed rulesets that are constantly updated, and advanced bot reporting and mitigation. - Also includes Zone Lockdown Rules which allows for the whitelisting of specific IP addresses and IP ranges, while all other IPs are effectively blacklisted.

Enhance security and analytics with the Business plan

- Detect and challenge sophisticated bots (highly variable traffic signatures and novel bot attacks) using machine learning. - Monitor all your HTTP traffic to identify new attacks, security gaps, and fine tune WAF settings to stop threats. - Protect against unknown application vulnerabilities with WAF Attack Score Lite's machine learning models.

relatedBlades.title: Upgrade your website security and performance with free DNS & so much more!

planFeatures.name: Role-based Account Control
planFeatures.description: Role-based access for Cloudflare accounts enables organizations to collaborate across one Cloudflare account, and use roles-based permissions to control access. Each user is assigned an individual API key and can use two-factor authentication to protect their own account.

planFeatures.name: Cloudflare Rules
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Rules allows you to make adjustments to requests and responses, configure Cloudflare settings, and trigger specific actions for matching requests. Examples of rule use cases include setting cache expirations, modifying security levels for sections of your site, and forwarding URLs.

content.value: Why choose a Cloudflare plan?
Here's the TLDR. If you only read one thing, read this.
A robust global network at your fingertips
Uncompromised security and performance in one platform
Reduce latency, improve performance, and increase availability for all your applications
Real-time latency maps
Detailed traffic analytics
Predictable, transparent, and flexible pricing

relatedBlades.copy:
Getting started is easy

It only takes 5 minutes and we provide you with step-by-step instructions once you sign up

features.title: Create an account
features.description: You only need an email and a password. That's all!

features.title: Pick a plan
features.description: Add your site and choose a service plan based on the level of functionality and support you need.

features.title: Update nameservers
features.description: Make a quick change to your DNS settings in your registrar's dashboard (don't worry we'll show you how!).

features.title: Get going
features.description: Activate Cloudflare features in minutes to take advantage of all the performance benefits.

accordionElements.title: Can I keep my current DNS provider and still use the other features of the Pro plan?

content.value: This feature requires a Business or Enterprise Plan. The Business and Enterprise plans allow you to still leverage our network with a partial (CNAME) setup while maintaining your current DNS provider.

accordionElements.title: Cloudflare offers free CDN and DNS. Why should I pay for a Business plan?

content.value: With Cloudflare Business you have access to the same great DNS, CDN and DDoS protection tools as our Free and Pro plans give you, but you enjoy increased control over how you can use these tools. For example, with Cloudflare Business, you have more "page rules" available to dictate how CDN caches your content, including what gets cached and for how long at the individual page level.

accordionElements.title: I'm already a Cloudflare customer. How do I enable the Business plan?

content.value: Start by logging into the
Cloudflare dashboard
Select the site you wish to upgrade;
Then, on the right side of the Overview page locate the "Active Subscriptions" section, and next to your current plan click the "Change" button;
Select the Business plan and click "Continue". You're all set!
Note: If you have not had a paid plan before, you will be asked to enter your credit card and billing information prior to completing your upgrade to the Business plan.

accordionElements.title: What does the Business plan provide that other plans do not?

content.value: Guaranteed uptime. 100% uptime service level agreement (SLA).
Built-in compliance. Meet PCI compliance simply by enabling the Cloudflare WAF and Modern TLS Only mode. Also includes SOC 2 Type II compliance and SOC 3 compliance.
Prioritized support. Get professional support when you need it, with ticket & chat priority.

accordionElements.title: When is the right time to upgrade from the Free plan to Pro plan?

content.value: Over 50% of Cloudflare's Pro plan customers started on the Free plan and eventually upgrade so that they can activate more security and performance features. Ultimately, the decision to upgrade is yours, but if any of the conditions below are true, you will likely find the Pro plan beneficial:
Your website is generating revenue on a monthly basis;
You have more than 1TB of web traffic;
You fully manage your web server and are responsible for upgrading, patching and maintenance;
Your website uses server-side applications (PHP, Python, Ruby, C#, JavaScript, etc.)
There is a substantial risk if your website is hacked.

accordionElements.title: What is a WAF (Web Application Firewall) and why does it matter?

content.value: Cloudflare Web Application Firewall's intuitive dashboard enables users to build powerful rules through easy clicks. Every request to the WAF is inspected against the rule engine and the threat intelligence curated from protecting millions of websites. Suspicious requests can be blocked, challenged or logged as per the needs of the user while legitimate requests are routed to the destination.

relatedBlades.title: Don't risk your site security and performance

buttonOne.elementName: Get started in just 5 minutes dash/sign-up
